001package org.nasdanika.architecture.maven;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005
006import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.LifecyclePhase;
007import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
008import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.gen.C4SiteGeneratorContributor;
009import org.nasdanika.architecture.cloud.azure.compute.gen.ComputeSiteGeneratorContributor;
010import org.nasdanika.architecture.cloud.azure.networking.gen.NetworkingSiteGeneratorContributor;
011import org.nasdanika.architecture.cloud.azure.storage.gen.StorageSiteGeneratorContributor;
012import org.nasdanika.architecture.containers.docker.gen.DockerSiteGeneratorContributor;
013import org.nasdanika.architecture.containers.helm.gen.HelmSiteGeneratorContributor;
014import org.nasdanika.architecture.containers.kubernetes.gen.KubernetesSiteGeneratorContributor;
015import org.nasdanika.architecture.core.gen.CoreSiteGeneratorContributor;
016import org.nasdanika.html.model.app.gen.SiteGeneratorContributor;
017import org.nasdanika.html.model.app.gen.maven.SemanticSiteGeneratorMojo;
018
019/**
020 * Generates action site.
021 */
022@Mojo(name = "generate-site", defaultPhase = LifecyclePhase.SITE)
023public class SiteGeneratorMojo extends SemanticSiteGeneratorMojo {
024
025        @Override
026        protected List<SiteGeneratorContributor> getContributors() {
027                List<SiteGeneratorContributor> contributors = new ArrayList<>(super.getContributors());
028                contributors.add(new CoreSiteGeneratorContributor());
029                contributors.add(new C4SiteGeneratorContributor());
030
031                contributors.add(new org.nasdanika.architecture.cloud.azure.core.gen.CoreSiteGeneratorContributor());
032                contributors.add(new ComputeSiteGeneratorContributor());
033                contributors.add(new NetworkingSiteGeneratorContributor());
034                contributors.add(new StorageSiteGeneratorContributor());
035                
036                contributors.add(new DockerSiteGeneratorContributor());
037                contributors.add(new KubernetesSiteGeneratorContributor());
038                contributors.add(new HelmSiteGeneratorContributor());
039//              contributors.add(new IstioSiteGeneratorContributor());
040                
041                return contributors;
042        }
043        
044
045}
